LanguageData.ManaDrain.label: mana drain
LanguageData.ManaDrain.lettertext:
The planet's celestial alignment is shifting, causing an ebb in mana.

All creatures attuned with magical powers will slowly lose mana.

Creatures may become physically ill if they have no mana remaining.
LanguageData.ManaSurge.label: mana surge
LanguageData.ManaSurge.lettertext: The planet's celestial alignment has shifted, causing a surge in mana. All creatures attuned with magical powers will gain mana at an increased rate.
LanguageData.Disease_ManaSickness.label: mana sickness
LanguageData.Disease_ManaSickness.lettertext: {0} has gotten sick from {1}.\n\nEnsure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that {2} gets proper treatment and spends as much time in bed as possible. During this period {0} will be unable to gain mana.
LanguageData.ElementalAssault.label: elemental assault
LanguageData.ElementalAssault.lettertext:
Hostile elementals have created a breach into your world and are preparing to send assault teams through the rift!

Rifts cause mayhem in the atmosphere as energy leaks through the rift into your world. The following effects occur for each rift element:

Fire Rift: meteor showers and heat waves.
Earth Rift: toxic fumes and causes animals to go berserk
Ice Rift: hailstorms and rapid decline in temperature
Air Rift: lightning storms

Destroy the rift to end this nightmare!
LanguageData.WanderingLich.label: Wandering lich
LanguageData.WanderingLich.lettertext:
An ancient lich has wandered into the area and is preparing to assault your colony.

Lichs are powerful creatures by themselves, but their true strength resides in their ability to create animated undead from the corpses of the deceased.

This lich is an ancient being that despises all life, and your merry band of living -things- has so far resisted being snuffed out. It will actively seek to end your story of survival by creating a horde of undead to overwhelm your defenses.

The lich will periodically create new skeleton warriors to attack the colony; allowing the lich to complete a ritual near an exposed corpse will increase the chance skeleton giants are created. Ultimately, the lich will assault the colony itself, if waves of undead are unable to complete the task first.
LanguageData.DemonAssault.label: demon attack
LanguageData.DemonAssault.lettertext:
The end is nigh - rampaging demons are attacking your colony!
Like a herald to impending doom, fire and ash have begun falling from the skies.

These infernal beings have an assortment of attacks and challenging tactics.
However, demons are unable to remain in this realm for extended periods and will be force to return to their hellish plane in about 3 hours. Defeat or outlast this nightmare.
There is very little time to prepare.

Good luck!
